Detailed Description

Sprite based font drawing.

This class supports BMFont files, and uses a texture atlas with dynamic vertex buffer. Consequently, the texts can be animated dynamically.

Texts have to be organised into groups (for example a group might be a particular menu's texts) and can be handled separately.
